content: Ms. Sonja gathered her students together and said, "I am giving you 123 words. Now see if you can build a new language with just these words."
translations: ita:La signora Sonja riunì i suoi studenti e disse﹕ Vi do 123 parole. Ora vedete se riuscite a costruire una nuova lingua so
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
